title: Important Question Need Help about charge back
body:
So my account got suspended due to a charge back from my bank now recently someone committed fraud on my account through a third party website after dealing with all that I got my money back (thank god) but I guess my bank made a mistake after I told them that riot purchases was me 

But the question is if my account is permanently suspended and I pay the charge back money will my account be available to me again ?

Please help

replies.body: I recommend[ submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can help with your specific issue.  We also have a detailed [Chargeback Guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753334-Chargebacks)that can provide some more visibility on how situations like this might be handled.  Best of luck!
